title: CSV Mapping Schema
description: Schema for the CSV mapping file used to extract specific test plans

csv_data.description: Array of rows from the CSV file

row_index.description: The index of the row in the CSV file (0-based)

test_suite_name.description: Name of the test suite from column 1

owner.description: Owner of the test suite from column 2

email.description: Email of the owner from column 3

urls.description: Array of Azure DevOps URLs from column 4

url.description: The full URL from the CSV

plan_id.description: The extracted plan ID from the URL

suite_id.description: The extracted suite ID from the URL

additional_data.description: Additional data from columns beyond the first 4

plan_suite_mapping.description: Mapping of plan IDs to their suite IDs

metadata.description: Metadata about the CSV file and parsing process

file_name.description: Name of the parsed CSV file

parse_date.description: Date and time when the CSV was parsed

total_rows.description: Total number of rows in the CSV file

valid_url_rows.description: Number of rows with valid Azure DevOps URLs

total_urls.description: Total number of valid URLs extracted

unique_plan_ids.description: Number of unique plan IDs extracted
